body:
At core we will always offer our holders the most value that makes sense no matter the situation we are put in. Things can change just like any startup so we highly recommend all holders to constantly keep an eye on announcements in discord

Tip: Use #verification to confirm role

Marketing tip:

Your enemy as a startup founder is noise.

You’ll add features
You’ll talk to your users
You’ll check out competitors

The key concept to remember? Stick to one simple story your users will recognize. 

Always choose clarity over clutter.

Breaking into VC tip:

If you find a startup that fits the criteria of the firm you are interested in joining, send it to them w/ a short pitch on why you think it's a compelling opportunity. 

Show them you already operate like a VC so when a role opens up, you’re top of mind.

New email, who dis?

I've officially landed at @statnews to cover biopharma startups and venture capital. Send tips/questions to allison.deangelis@statnews.com.

5 tips for launching your startup:

1. Buildd an audience before launching a product.
2. Write on social media, publish newsletters, etc.
3. Prepare a thorough plan at least a few weeks prior.
4. Launch on multiple channels, don't depend on only one.
5. Distribution >> Creation

having trouble raising money for your startup? two quick tips for founders:

1) grow faster
2) become profitable
@FantasyFervor @dynastysociety_ I’m about to do my first IDP startup.  Any tips?  Do I wait on picking D players?
Angel tip: Profitability shouldn’t restrict impact nor ambition. If the market is big enough, and the startup is defensible at scale—go get it! 😇
Startup culture for remote teams: What are some team-building tips for creating a great culture for a remote team?

As the domestic tech media gets stronger and more people begin to respect and trust the media, they'll freely share tips with the media and helpful info. One startup announced a funding round, but it's reported lead investor is confused on WhatsApp saying "when did we invest?"

Startup Idea: An app that can measure your anxiety level, and give some tips to calm down.

5 simple ways to get early customers for your startup. 

Every time I host a space or join one, we’re asked “How do I find early customers?” 

On a budget it can be difficult & social media ads for those first customers are tricky/ costly. So here’s tips.

I've seen so many investors wondering why they don't make money having invested in #ICOs and #crypto projects... 

 #Tokenomics isn’t relevant ✍🏻

In this 🧵, I'll be sharing basic tips/advice for #DeFi Startups & Investors.

NB: this could be vary depending on the project.

Marketing tip:

The longer you wait with SEO the longer it will take to become a profitable startup.

PPC campaigns will immediately get you revenue but with low margins.

SEO will take months but provides cash flow for other acquisition channels allowing faster growth.

@GergelyOrosz The sweet spot for equity in 2022 is in startups that:

1. Were massively accelerated by the pandemic.

2. Translated that growth in 100x or so increase in revenue.

4. Raised last VC round before the pandemic.

Pro tip: You get 2019 share price for something worth much more now.

#Founders - looking for a great networking tip? Do amazing work and exhibit kindness and compassion to everyone you cross paths with. That’s it!

Being a great person can pay tremendous dividends over the course of your career.

#startup #entrepreneur

Are your cold emails landing in the spam folder? Did you warm up your domain before sending out emails?

How do I go about doing this? Any tips are appreciated. Thank you!

I’m excited to share that I’ve joined @ISMGCorp as Managing Editor, Business, where I’ll be covering the vendor and technology landscape including M&A, startups, and key trends, with a focus on what’s relevant for CISOs. 

Please send news tips or story ideas to mnovinson@ismg.io

The GF is a former Activist Feminist who now works at a startup incubator. Naturally, it was her idea.
